channel.title: Bots?
channel.description: Just i have never botted and i want to try it out now but i have no luck finding any :( could anyone give me a short walk through

item.title: Bots?
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:31, topic:439179”][quote author=Loveandpower link=topic=541880.msg3971798#msg3971798 date=1334235011]
If your so paranoid about botting clients being unsafe either use in sandbox or make your own. Simple as that. Will it take some time? obviously
[/quote]How would that make it any better? You would still be putting your info in the client[/quote]

Sandboxing it protects you from malicious stuff coming from the updater. Just don’t put your info in it lol.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:29, topic:439179”]If your so paranoid about botting clients being unsafe either use in sandbox or make your own. Simple as that. Will it take some time? obviously[/quote]How would that make it any better? You would still be putting your info in the client

Read full topic

item.title: Bots?
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

Jagex ruined the game by making it too easy to make money. Then when they make it so it’s slightly harder, kids complain. Work for your damn money, don’t bot it.

Read full topic

item.title: Bots?
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote="…::Coded::…, post:27, topic:439179"][quote author=Daginith link=topic=541880.msg3971582#msg3971582 date=1334198603]

I’m still trying to figure out why you would bot on a game that is meant to be played. What’s the fun in that? Call me a legitfag or what you will, but I quit solely because of everything that has happened to RS in the past 5 years. 2008 was where it was at.

I played legit till my lvl 117 was banned in 2010.
[/quote]
I played legit till my 126 was hacked, guess what, I made a new account and continued to play legit.[/quote]
I dont really see the fun in the game anymore. In the past 2 weeks Jagex made it worse and worse.

Im prob gunna sell my skiller on Sythe…

Read full topic

I played legit till my lvl 117 was banned in 2010. :p[/quote]
I played legit till my 126 was hacked, guess what, I made a new account and continued to play legit.

item.title: Bots?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“Daginith, post:23, topic:439179”][quote author=Kidpaparoach link=topic=541880.msg3971422#msg3971422 date=1334188292]
Just saying… epicbot is an .exe file type meaning if they wanted to eff you up they’d just install malware? I’m sure they could encrypt it really well etc considering how big they are:L.
[/quote]
I just use the Linux version, which is a .jar

Ive decompiled it, and looked a bit. Nothing bad in the source.
Although i cant say for the .exe. Its on my Windows computer, and it has not messed up anything yet…[/quote]
your misunderstanding what im saying. I’m saying that if if they wanted to they would take the details via other means. epicbots safe js.

Read full topic

item.title: Bots?
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

Kidpaparoach:

Just saying… epicbot is an .exe file type meaning if they wanted to eff you up they’d just install malware? I’m sure they could encrypt it really well etc considering how big they are:L.

I just use the Linux version, which is a .jar

Ive decompiled it, and looked a bit. Nothing bad in the source.
Although i cant say for the .exe. Its on my Windows computer, and it has not messed up anything yet…

Read full topic

item.title: Bots?
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“t4, post:16, topic:439179”][quote author=ziplock link=topic=541880.msg3970602#msg3970602 date=1334103540]

mathematical engineering wtf and wtf at mechanical having anything to do with this

Yes, and it cost around $7000 just to get a simple functioning bot such as this one.

[/quote]

[quote author=the elve age link=topic=541880.msg3970951#msg3970951 date=1334146864]

mathematical engineering wtf and wtf at mechanical having anything to do with this
[/quote]Robot… Bot… Terrible sense of humor, knowing this has been asked on numerous pages of RS discussion.

Oh, ok. The whole mathematical engineering is throwing me off since all engineering routes are heavily soaked in mathematics - it basically sounds like you’ve made up a term.[/quote]I made up the reference in my post

Read full topic

item.title: Bots?
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

[quote=“Daginith, post:10, topic:439179”][quote author=heatrn11 link=topic=541880.msg3970576#msg3970576 date=1334102040]

Epicbot hacks you.

Only if you put in your info for the bot, login to your account manually… use the brain that god gave you.
[/quote]
Ive gotten 3 99’s with epic bot. and made over 10m with it. Not hacked once.

And yeah, log into the acc manually.
not only does it bot, but it also does random events too.[/quote]Hell yeah!

Read full topic

item.title: Bots?
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“Daginith, post:10, topic:439179”][quote author=heatrn11 link=topic=541880.msg3970576#msg3970576 date=1334102040]

Epicbot hacks you.

Only if you put in your info for the bot, login to your account manually… use the brain that god gave you.
[/quote]
Ive gotten 3 99’s with epic bot. and made over 10m with it. Not hacked once.

And yeah, log into the acc manually.
not only does it bot, but it also does random events too.[/quote]
Yes, that’s what people don’t understand about this… -.-
Just use a fake password, but I don’t know of it being a hacking “device”. Otherwise, I recommend Epicbot to the maximum.

Read full topic
